data.text: Sofaal nii é zeɠezu Naama, naa kpɔɛi zeɠeni, é ɠɛ ma:
«Wɛlɛ niizu, nà-kisiɛiti ta ɓɔizu dà ga gè gooɠaaʋotegi ve,
Gè zeliiti mɛnigɛ, ti la zɔleni gàazu.
È la suɠwɛɛ ɓaa ga, siɛnɔpɛ su,
nu ɲɔiti ta-vɔnifaamai zu la ɗa ga ɠooza,
Anɛɛ siɛgi zu sɔligi zeizu la geei ʋa,
Toɠa ɲɛɛlɛ eyɛsu ɠɔ, eɠɛ tɔ ɓɔɠɔi koozu ɓooi.
Toɠa ɲɛɛlɛzu eɠɛ segi, kɔɠɔʋo ge loo ya,
Ti zunui naa ɠaani, kɛlɛ ti la mɔ kaa pɛ,
Ná-doun zunuiti ta bala nuiti zee ɠaaɠale ma, niiti é looni ti ma.
Zɛbɛi ɠɛni ba ná-nu niinɛlai zu,
«Anɛɛ ni faa ɲɔi nɛɛʋɛ da,
é makɛ ba, é la ɠɛlɛa ba,
daamianigi ɠa valibo koozuʋɛ,
Naavoloiti é ti ɓɔleni zɔiti zea, toɠa unpili ga tiye,
Toɠa kɛlɛɓɛzɛi ma wanaiti kpɔlezu.
«É la mɔ ɠidia ná, ga toɠa kɔin gulɔi zɔlɔɔ mɔnɔ ga undaanɛɛi, eɠɛ ziɛ wolaiti,
Toɠa ɓɔlɔzu lɔnɔgi kpein pu ya, é la yiimaɠɛa su.
Mazɔlɔɔ é bala nuiti koloɠoloni, é ɠɛlɛ ti ʋa,
Tɔɔzei ziima vai la ɠɛni ɠɛɛni,
Toɠa maayii ɠɛ ga nui kpein,
Anɛɛ ná-sɔlɔɔ golai naa kpein saama, toɠa ɠɛ kpalai zu.
Siɛgi zu é ɓalazu la ga é ɠogi zulaave,
A ʋelana kɔɔɠɔ zɔɔlai ʋa é ga kɔlu gelei,
Mɛɛin é bɔai poluʋɛ, a naa ɠulana ɓɔɠɔ ʋa,
Kpidii makɛgɛ daalɔɠɔma ga ná-tɔnɔgi,
Geeɠɔlɔgi ɠa ná-faaɠaazagiti kula kɛlɛma,
GALA ná-ziiɠaawana voloi,
Naa ɠa é ga kasɔi, GALA ge kɛʋele ɓɛtɛai nu ɲɔi ná-faa ma, maanɛai é sɔlɔɔ.
